cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I give you warmth, so you can go out and play. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 Plants need me to grow on Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball that travels around the Sun. I am where you live. What am I?
I shine at night but I don't have my own light. I reflect light from the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 People sometimes say I am made of cheese
🌑 I change shape, sometimes I am full, sometimes I am just a sliver.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas that is very far away. I twinkle in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 The Sun is one of me.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me very well.

cosmos.question: I am a planet that is known for being red. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I am named after the Roman god of war.
🔴 I have a dusty, rusty surface.

cosmos.question: I am a planet with beautiful rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
💨 I am very big, the second biggest in the solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars, dust, and gas held together by gravity. Our Sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am shaped like a spiral.
✨ I am very, very big and contain billions of stars.
🥛 Our is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a rock that flies through space, sometimes with a tail of gas and dust. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am made of ice, dust, and rock.
💫 I can be seen from Earth when I get close to the Sun.
🧊 I leave a bright streak in the sky.

cosmos.question: I am a force that pulls everything together, even you to the Earth! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I made an apple fall on someone's head.
🧲 I keep you from floating into space.
⬇️ I am what makes things fall down, not up.

transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I am something you can drive.

transport.question: I float on water and carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I am a form of transport.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car.
💺 I have seats for many people.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦵 You need to balance on me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many passengers. What am I?
I am big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?
I help put out fires and have a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I use water to stop fires.

transport.question: I’m a car that you can hail down. I take you where you want to go in a city.

hints.text: 💰 You pay a fare to ride in me.
📍 I can be found at stands in town.

transport.question: I fly high but don't have wings. I have big blades that spin around.

hints.text: 🏥 I can be used for emergencies.

transport.question: I travel through space and take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍🚀 People who fly me wear special suits.
